name: Meteor Assault
description: The user attacks wildly with its thick leek. Make a melee attack, dealing 3d8 + MOVE fighting damage on a hit. This move cannot be used on consecutive turns by the same creature.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 5d6 at level 5, 4d12 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.
